characters.name: Lior
characters.description: Incubus, twin of Louan, grandson of Asmode, nephew of Lilith. Called Li by friends

characters.name: Louan
characters.description: Incubus, twin of Lior, grandson of Asmode, nephew of Lilith. Called Lou by friends

characters.name: Cameo "Cami"
characters.description: A shade, mix of angel and fairy

characters.name: Asmode
characters.description: Lord Lust, ruler of incubi and succubae. Also called lord of joy

characters.name: Crescenzo
characters.description: Incubus, in charge of Asmode’s treasures

characters.name: Dionysus
characters.description: Incubus, eldest

characters.name: Justus
characters.description: Incubus, formerly in charge of Asmode’s treasures, deceased

characters.name: Lilith
characters.description: Succubus, of Justus’s essence, aunt to the twins

characters.name: Myron
characters.description: Incubus, in charge of decorations

characters.name: Tanguy
characters.description: Rare mixed spirit: reaper and incubus

characters.name: Ahava
characters.description: Succubus, friend of Lilith

characters.name: Lady Fear
characters.description: Lady of the House of Terror (ruler of the reapers)

characters.name: Arthur Evans
characters.description: Male witch, associated with the devils

characters.name: Blaize
characters.description: Devil, son of Lady Hate. Obsessed with Lilith

characters.name: Lady Hate
characters.description: Ruler of the devils

characters.name: Madame Zelda Andeo
characters.description: Witch, associated with the angels

characters.name: Granny Andeo
characters.description: Witch, head of the Andeo family, grandmother of Zelda and Hector, former friend of Charlotte Ravi, associated with the angels

characters.name: Hector Andeo
characters.description: Male witch, grandson of Granny Andeo, associated with the angels

characters.name: Knight Cole
characters.description: Sole heir of a billionaire

characters.name: Madeline “Maddie” Lavea Smith/Ravi
characters.description: Orphaned witch, twin of Benny, associated with incubi/succubae

characters.name: Benjamin “Benny” Oliver Smith/Ravi
characters.description: Orphaned witch, twin of Maddie, associated with incubi/succubae

characters.name: Charlotte Ravi
characters.description: former head of the Ravi family, friend of Granny Andeo, deceased

characters.name: Madame Amelia Verra
characters.description: dud of the Verra family of witches, acts as a medium

characters.name: Stella
characters.description: Angel that bonded with the shade Helios, deceased

characters.name: Helios
characters.description: Shade that bonded with the angel Stella, deceased

characters.name: Judge Rabia / Lord Ire
characters.description: Ruler of the poltergeists

characters.name: Aphrodite
characters.description: First Lady Lust, deceased

characters.name: Evelyn “Evie” Graham
characters.description: Human girl that was possessed by Louan

characters.name: Misty Moore
characters.description: Maddie’s alias at the boot camp

characters.name: Johnny Cash
characters.description: Louan’s alias at the boot camp

characters.name: Umbra
characters.description: Healer of the shades

characters.name: Mr. Leonard Jr.
characters.description: Knight Cole’s lawyer

characters.name: Mrs. Chen
characters.description: Housekeeper at the Cole estate

characters.name: Gloria Lee
characters.description: Arthur’s wife, potential witch hunter

characters.name: Hausmann family
characters.description: Witching family known for their ability to create magical devices, died out, inheritance went to the Ravis

characters.name: Grace Evans
characters.description: Head witch of Arthur’s family

characters.name: Rose Evans alias Rose Lily Lee
characters.description: Daughter of Arthur and Gloria, sometimes called Rosie by Chris

characters.name: Christopher “Chris”
characters.description: Foundling spirit, supposedly a fairy

characters.name: Kell
characters.description: Fairy, foster father of Chris

characters.name: Charlotte “Lottie” Ravi
characters.description: Maddie’s firstborn

characters.name: Paula Donato
characters.description: Head of Donato family, witches associated with the chapter of joy

characters.name: Evan
characters.description: Rose’s brother

characters.name: Rigel
characters.description: Rose’s distant cousin, witch hunter

characters.name: William “Bill” Ury
characters.description: Rigel’s father, distant uncle of Rose, figurehead of the family

characters.name: Grayson “Gray” Ury
characters.description: Another distant cousin of Rose

characters.name: Josie Ury
characters.description: Grayson’s sister

characters.name: Joe Ury
characters.description: Bill’s brother, head of the family, living reclused

characters.name: Mrs. Schuler
characters.description: former schoolteacher of Joe and Bill Ury

characters.name: Jerry Ury
characters.description: Distant cousin of Joe’s and Bill’s mother, deceased

characters.name: John Ury
characters.description: Younger sibling of Joe and Bill

characters.name: Doctor Jennings
characters.description: physician at the county hospital
